scenario_text.value:
Hi, Takuma. We still haven’t found the
shrine.

Forget that for a second. I found a pack of
enemies.
What?!

A pack? That don’t sound like one or two
jokers.

Agumon and I wouldn’t be able to handle them
on our own...
I’ll be damned...

Apparently they live in here. They might know
something about the shrine.
(Who should I ask to help?)
Follow me, Aoi!
Come with me, Ryo!
Follow me, Aoi!
Follow me, Aoi!

Understood. This is a good opportunity to
gather some intel, from the sound of it.
So what, I just stay here, then?
You come too, Ryo!
Thought so. Never doubted you, dammit!
Come with me, Ryo!
Come with me, Ryo!

Crashing the bad guy convention... Shit, if
we gotta, then we gotta.

Hold on, I’m coming, too! Strength in
numbers, right?
Thanks, that’d be a big help!
You got it!

We’ll call the others. You do the same,
Takuma!
Right, let’s meet up later!
Come on, Ryo!

B-but my heart ain’t ready yet... Ahhh, fine!
I’m coming!
